{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking about the best radiographic view for diagnosing horizontally favorable and unfavorable fractures. These are typically fractures of the mandible. The Occlusal view is used to visualize the occlusal plane of either the maxilla or mandible. The Lateral Oblique view is used to visualize the body and ramus of the mandible.
